title: Judge rejects Trump lawsuit challenging ban from Twitter - The Associated Press - en Español
content: Judge rejects Trump lawsuit challenging ban from Twitter  The Associated Press - en EspañolView Full Coverage on Google News
description: LOS ANGELES (AP) — A San Francisco judge tossed out former President Donald Trump’s lawsuit challenging his permanent ban from Twitter. U.S. District Judge James Donato said Friday that Trump failed to show Twitter violated his First Amendment right to free speech.
